turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated. I can't seem to find where to download my bank statements from last year. Can you help me locate them?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. To access your bank statements from last year, please log in to your online banking account. Once logged in, navigate to the 'Statements' or 'Documents' section. You should be able to filter by year and download the statements you need. Let me know if you have trouble finding that.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I found the statements section, but it only shows the last 6 months. Is there a limit to how far back I can access statements online? Why would you limit how far back I can go?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Good question. While online access typically provides statements for the past 18 months, statements older than that might be archived. To obtain statements from further back, you can request them through customer service. There may be a small fee associated with retrieving archived statements. This limitation is due to system storage constraints and security protocols designed to protect your data. Would you like me to provide the phone number for customer service?
